title: Himi 323
lyrics:
5.5.5.11.
1.
’E hoku kāinga,
Ke tau tokanga
Ki he me’a ni,
‘Oku tau ‘aunofo, ‘i he māmani.
2.
Ko hotau ‘api,
Mei he ‘Eiki,
Ko ‘etau Tamai
‘Oku ‘i hēvani, pea tu’uma’u pē.
3.
’Oku foaki,
‘A e ‘api ni,
‘E hotau ‘Eiki;
Ki he’ene fānau, kuo tupu fo’ou.
4.
Ke tau fai fo’ou,
Hotau fononga,
Ki hotau ‘api na;
‘I he huafa, ‘o hotau ‘Eiki.
5.
’Oku fekau mai,
’E hotau ‘Eiki,
Ke tau tokanga,
Ki hotau ‘api na, ‘oku ta’engata.
6.
Ke tau li’aki,
‘A māmani,
Mo hono lelei,
Pea tau tui, ki hotau ‘Eiki.
7.
Ko e fonua,
‘O hotau ‘Eiki
‘Oku tau kumi;
‘Oku tu’u ma’u ai pē, ‘a hono lelei. *
